page.description: Converts a time value to seconds.

argument.name: character
argument.description: A time value in one of the following formats:"h:m:s am/pm", "h:m:s", "h:m"

page.discussion: Converts a Formatted_Time containing a time value to an integer Count equal to the number of seconds past midnight. You typically use TOSECONDS() to perform time arithmetic to compute the elapsed time between a starting and ending time, or to compute an ending time from a start time and an elapsed time. The TOSECONDS() function supports fractional seconds, e.g. toseconds("3:23:05.23 pm").
